author: Telegraph Staff
title: The Fab Five: Edinburgh hotels with oppulent interiors
text:
MORE... 
The Witchery by the Castle 
This extraordinary collection of fantasy suites is the ultimate romantic hideaway: sumptuous, indulgent and slightly mad. The nine suites are an antique dealer’s dream, all jewel-coloured velvets, silks, carved wood, gilding and candlelight – think decadent ecclesiastical. Behind hidden doors a sitting room, dressing room or study will surprise and delight. The “Inner Sanctum” has a working fireplace, while the “Turret” boasts the best views. 
Read the full review: Witchery by the Castle
